TextView.android:text: Request for Assessment of Newly Discovered Real Property
This is to make a Tax Declaration of a newly discovered real property.
G2C - Government to Citizen\nG2G - Government to Government
Tax Declarant/Owner, Authorized Representative of the Declarant/Owner & Coordinating Offices
2. Inspection Report of the MASSO (1 original copy)
3. 2 Pictures of the Property (1 original copy)
5. RPT Tax Payment of Current Year (2 photocopy)\n(Situational Requirements)
1. Electronic copy of the Title (1 original copy)

2. Approved Plan/V-37, A&D Certification, Order: approval of Application with authenticated conveyance, Numbered Free Patent application form & Affidavit of 2 disinterested person (situational) (1 original copy)
3. Certificate of Actual Occupancy (1 original copy)
For DAR issued Titles: (1 original copy)
1. Certified True Copy of the Title (1 original copy)
2. DAR Project Beneficiary Certificate (1 original copy)
4. Certificate of Actual Occupancy (1 original copy)
2. Approved Plan/V-37 or Certificate of Land Disposition, A&D Certification (1 original copy)
1. Approved Plan/V-37 or Certificate of Land Disposition, A&D Certification & Affidavit of 2 Disinterested Persons (1 original copy)
1. CENRO – Don Carlos, Bukidnon or DENR 10 - Puntod, CDO
2. Certificate of Actual Occupancy (1 original copy)
1. Building Plan & Building Permit (1 original copy)
1. Accomplishes the Request Form and submits the required documents.
1.1. Provides Request Form and evaluates the required documents according to the Checklist of Requirements.
- If the evaluated documents are incomplete, asks for the Checklist of Requirements Form and secures the lacking documents.
1.2. If the submitted documents are lacking, returns the submitted documents. Advises client to secure the required documents and gives a copy of the Checklist Form. End of Service
- If the required documents are complete, accomplishes the Sworn Statement.
1.3. If the required documents are complete, let the client accomplish the Sworn Statement.
2.2. Assigns PIN in the FAAS form & QGIS per parcel
2.5. Reviews of Property Assessment Computation & data entries for printing of the assessment documents
2. Pays 10 years Back Tax at the Municipal Treasurer’s Office & submit the RPT Official Receipt payment to the Assessor Office
2.6. Instructs the client to pay the10 years Back Tax at the Municipal Treasurer Office
5 minutes upon receipt of Billing Statement
2.7. Retrieves the RPT Official Receipt & photocopies the documents
2.8. Prints the FAAS, Tax Declaration, NOA & Inspection Report
2.9. Verifies & signs the FAAS, Tax Declaration, NOA & Inspection Report & its supporting documents
2.10. Uploads the Geo-package to PASSO Tax Mapping Department via email
2.11. Segregates the assessment documents for transmittal & office file
3.1. Records documents in the logbook. Issues the Inspection Report to the client.
4. Accomplishes the Client Satisfaction Survey (CSS) form and drops in the feedback drop box.
4.1. Gives CSS form for service feedback. Instructs the client to place the accomplished CSS form in the feedback drop box.
